segments.text: Here is a present for you . I hope you like it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , great ! I love it ! You know I've been expecting this for a long time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm very glad to hear that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come here ; let me introduce some friends to you .
segments.speaker: S2
